reviews.review_msg: Me and my friends consider this our 'fun class'. His powerpoints are always very concise and easy to follow, and he presents with a lot of energy and a positive attitude. There aren't many assignments, and the ones assigned are very straight forward and not super difficult. Exams are also easy. Absolutely love Joe and this class.

The lectures online are boring as they are pretty long and honestly not worth attending at times (since they're also recorded). The grading definitely lies in your TA's hands as it depends who you get (hopefully an easy marker) and there aren't many assignments as we only had 3 assignments, a midterm, and a final.
